name: Hayph
description:
Instructions:

Win condition: Defeat both Nexus in the third area of the Hayph.
Loose condition: Reach either 0 HP or 0 AP. Both looses the game instantly.

Tips:
- You regain all spent AP when you loose HP.
- In Hard Mode, critters respawn twofold in the third area, except they are killed in the third area.
